verbs.description: [ARG0: izzo] [V: says] [ARG1: he never tried to cover up sex assault allegations michigan state coach tom izzo insisted thursday he was never part of an effort to cover up allegations of sexual misconduct within the school athletic department the hall of famer said the idea that he would be involved sickens him izzo said the low point in his life was an espn report last winter saying michigan state had a history of covering up incidents of sexual assault in the football and men basketball programs it stated that former spartans basketball player travis walton was named in a sexual assault report and had assault and battery charges dismissed in 2010 at the time walton was a graduate assistant izzo basketball michigan tom izzo assault michigan state]

izzo says [ARG0: he] [ARGM-NEG: never] [V: tried] [ARG1: to cover up sex assault allegations] michigan state coach tom izzo insisted thursday he was never part of an effort to cover up allegations of sexual misconduct within the school athletic department the hall of famer said the idea that he would be involved sickens him izzo said the low point in his life was an espn report last winter saying michigan state had a history of covering up incidents of sexual assault in the football and men basketball programs it stated that former spartans basketball player travis walton was named in a sexual assault report and had assault and battery charges dismissed in 2010 at the time walton was a graduate assistant izzo basketball michigan tom izzo assault michigan state
